title: File:Santa Marta, Colombia by Planet Labs.jpg
author: Planet Labs, Inc.
description:
Santa Marta, Colombia December 18, 2016
  • Since its founding in 1525—this conquistador's colony is the second oldest of its kind in South America. Today, tourists visit its clear beaches for dolphin spotting, and take scenic hikes into the local mountains to learn about the ancient Tayrona culture. Image taken by a RapidEye satellite
